page.title: 14THE LIFE OF AN 8 YEAR OLD
page.content: The first thing I do in the morning is I wake up and get dressed then I go down to breakfast.After breakfast I go upstairs to the bathroom to do my teeth wash my face and brush my hair. After that if there is time I do my piano practise then I get on my shoes and coat and wait for Victoria, a friend, when she comes we all say goodbye and walk to school. When I get to school I sometimes go inside and read a book or stay outside and play. When the bell rings all the children go inside and sit down at their table and wait for Mrs Onions. When Mrs Onions comes she tells us to sit down for assembly and then the infants come in for assembly too. We sing about two hymns and have a story and prayer then the infants go back to their classroom and the junior class goes to sit down.
